description.en: Plugin (PLI) is a decentralized Oracle Platform that provides cost effective solutions to any smart contract which runs on XinFin XDC Network Eco System. Plugin enables the smart contract to connect with the real-time world and the data that it receives from the data feed provider is trustable by maintaining high degree of security. Off-chain computation it does takes care of receiving feed from multiple provider and aggregates the same.
